actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-132.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-132) Authorizes, effective January 3, l977, the payment of an amount not to exceed $3,197,000 from the contingent fund of the House for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted pursuant to the rules of the House by the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce. Directs that no part of the funds authorized by this resolution shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study or investigation of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other committee of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
